Title: Establishes the "Electric Vehicle Infrastructure and Liability Act"
Summary: Establishes the "Electric Vehicle Infrastructure and Liability Act" which requires additional fees to be collected from electric vehicle owners and operators for fire prevention and infrastructure.
LawCode: Add ยง114-f, amd ยง401, V & T L; amd ยง354, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the public authorities law, in relation to establishing the "Electric Vehicle Infrastructure and Liability Act"
